revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #01 Zreza (Cheri) |image = [[File:Cheri.png]] |caption = Es de color rojo vivo y su sabor picante resulta muy sugerente. Sus flores son extremadamente bellas y delicadas. |growtime = 30s |harvest = 2 bayas |replant = 50% |points = 5 |flavor =
*10 picante *0 seco *0 dulce *0 amargo *0 ácido }} '''Zreza (Cheri)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|Granja]] para obtener [[Farming Points|Puntos de Granja]]. Se puede obtener como recomensa aleatoria al derrotar Pokémon salvajes en las rutas. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 5 seg || 10 seg || 20 seg || 30 seg - 1 min |- ! Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CheriTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CheriTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:CheriTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Tiempos de maduración con modificadores === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificador !! Tiempo hasta la madurez-marchitado |- ! Ninguno | 30 seg -
1 min |- ! Psydugadera | 20 seg -
40 seg |} == Diagrama de Flujo == [[File:Cheri_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
'''Leyenda:''' · Random Drop: Obtenido aleatoriamente en ruta ==Usos== ===Mutaciones===
Cheri berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Razz.png|20px]] [[Razz]] || [[File:Leppa.png|20px]] [[Leppa]] |- | [[File:Figy.png|20px]] [[Figy]] || - |- | [[File:Lum.png|20px]] [[Lum]] || [[File:Chesto.png|20px]] [[Chesto]]
[[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]]
[[File:Rawst.png|20px]] [[Rawst]]
[[File:Aspear.png|20px]] [[Aspear]]
[[File:Leppa.png|20px]] [[Leppa]]
[[File:Oran.png|20px]] [[Oran]]
[[File:Sitrus.png|20px]] [[Sitrus]] |- | [[File:Qualot.png|20px]] [[Qualot]] || [[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]]
[[File:Aspear.png|20px]] [[Aspear]] |- | [[File:Rindo.png|20px]] [[Rindo]] || [[File:Aguav.png|20px]] [[Aguav]] |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Power Plant|Common}} {{LootItem|Berry Forest|Common}} {{LootItem|New Mauville|Common}} {{LootItem|Eterna Forest|Common}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Common}} {{LootItem|Floccesy Ranch|Common}} {{LootItem|Pikachu Valley|Common}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Conflict|Common}} {{LootItem|Ruins of Life|Common}} |} |}
